EmailTemplate.description: USE FOR DPD PROJECTS: Vendor RFP - TCS
EmailTemplate.name: DPD - Vendor RFP - TCS
EmailTemplate.subject: DuPont {!eProject__c.Business_Unit__c} {!eProject__c.Name} DuPont Direct RFP
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
INSTRUCTIONS:
This process is to be used for all global DPD projects Use this version when TCS has the lead for DPD activities Check Accuracy of Content Copy email address below to the "Additional To:" field
Support.T03SAP@usa.dupont.com
Copy email addresses below to the "CC:" field
prameeda.abraham@dupont.com
Remember to include any documentation (i.e. FEL requirement document) before submitting Remove these instructions before sending this request via email Create a PQR and assign to TSR group: AT-DUPONT DIRECT
DuPont is requesting that TCS respond with their proposal within 2 weeks from date of this request.
DuPont SBU: {!eProject__c.Business_Unit__c}
Target Country: {!eProject__c.Target_Country__c}
Project Background
DuPont's {!eProject__c.Business_Unit__c} business unit is requesting a DuPont Direct implementation due to {!eProject__c.Project_Driver__c}.
{!eProject__c.Background__c}
Scope of Work
{!eProject__c.Problem_Statement__c}
Project Goal/Project Concept
{!eProject__c.Project_Concept__c}
Desired Go-Live Timeframe
{!eProject__c.Requested_Date__c}. Assume execution to start as soon as possible - please submit compressed schedule where possible.
Comments/Miscellaneous (i.e. required timing if applies)
{!eProject__c.Requested_Date_Issues__c}
Requestor/Contacts
Please submit your proposal to:
Delivery Manager: {!eProject__c.OwnerFullName} FEL Requirements:
Work description/expected work output:
Determine requirements Prepare Statement of Work and Project Approval Request Gain assistance from TCS in support of development, testing and implementation for this project.
This request should be billed against TCS 2014 - eCommerce CoE - DuPont Direct Project support for small/medium projects and enhancements
